function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on insecticide-based malaria vector control leading to insecticide resistance","Impact":"Development of insecticide resistance can compromise malaria control efforts","Mitigation":"Diversify vector control strategies and reduce reliance on insecticides","Technologies":"Development of new insecticide chemistries, market-shaping initiatives for next-generation ITNs and IRS","People":"Population at risk of malaria, public health authorities","Owner":"Innovative Vector Control Consortium, public-private partnerships"}]}
